metadata.subject: www.washingtonpost.com: In new poll, support for Trump has plunged, giving Clinton a double-digit lead - The Washington Post

relationships.description: Josephson is sending Epstein political polling information, suggesting some form of communication relationship

notable_quotes: What a difference a week makes!

analysis.summary: Barry Josephson emails Jeffrey Epstein a Washington Post article showing Trump's support plunging and Clinton gaining a double-digit lead in polls, commenting 'What a difference a week makes!' regarding the 2016 presidential election.
